title: BBQ Blanket for Resting Meat Compatible with Traeger Smoker Grill, Reusable Pellet Smoker Meat Insulated Resting Bag with Wide Mouth for Large Brisket/Beef,Gifts for Men Him Dad,Traeger Accessories
features: Traeger Accessories for Resting Meat: A must-have post-smoking professional resting meat accessory designed specifically for Traeger Grills.
5-Layer Insulation for Maximum Juiciness: Keep your meat tender and juicy with the innovative 5-layer insulation that locks in moisture and ensures an optimal resting temperature.

Generous Size for All Your Meats: Designed to accommodate large cuts of meat, our BBQ blanket measures 15” W x 21” H x 7” D, offering plenty of space for everything from turkey and pork shoulder to roasts and whole chickens.
Convenient Wide Opening for Effortless Access: The BBQ blanket features a wide-mouth design, allowing for easy placement and removal of meat.
Portable, Leak-Proof, and Secure: Whether you’re at home or on the go, our BBQ blanket is built for portability.

Low-Maintenance: Cleaning your BBQ blanket is a breeze! You can simply wipe it down with a damp cloth, wash with warm soapy water. With its easy-care design, you’ll always be ready for the next BBQ session without any stress.
